short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save articles to mystash.ai directly from your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: mystash.ai allows you to save any article, news or content you find interesting online and automatically categorize and summarize them. This plugin allows you to submit the article/url right from the browser
